description.value:
Heavenly radiance shines from an active celestial staff, a golden staff capped with a pair of sculpted angel's wings. Used as a weapon, the staff is a +2 greater striking holy staff. While wielding a celestial staff, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against effects that have the evil trait and effects created by evil creatures. When you prepare this staff, if you're evil, you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Drained]{Drained 1} until your next daily preparations.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Divine Lance]{Divine Lance} (good only)
  • 1st@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Bless]{Bless}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Protection]{Protection}
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Continual Flame]{Continual Flame},@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Inner Radiance Torrent]{Inner Radiance Torrent}
  • 3rd@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Circle of Protection]{Circle of Protection}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Sanctified Ground]{Sanctified Ground}
  • 4th@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Holy Cascade]{Holy Cascade}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Inner Radiance Torrent]{Inner Radiance Torrent}
  • 5th@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Spiritual Guardian]{Spiritual Guardian}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Summon Celestial]{Summon Celestial}
  • 6th@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Holy Cascade]{Holy Cascade}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Summon Celestial]{Summon Celestial}
  • 7th@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Angel Form]{Angel Form},@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Inner Radiance Torrent]{Inner Radiance Torrent}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Summon Celestial]{Summon Celestial}

    Craft Requirements You're good. Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
